mapper.select: SELECT p.product_id AS productId, p.product_name AS productName, p.option_value AS optionValue, p.product_type AS productType, p.cost_price AS costPrice, p.selling_price AS sellingPrice, p.manufacturer, p.country_of_origin AS countryOfOrigin, p.partner_id AS partnerId, (SELECT partner_name FROM TB_PARTNER WHERE partner_id = p.partner_id) AS partnerName, p.category, p.safe_stock AS safeStock, p.product_image AS productImage, p.created_at AS createdAt, p.updated_at AS updatedAt FROM TB_PRODUCT p ORDER BY p.product_id

SELECT p.product_id AS productId, p.product_name AS productName, p.option_value AS optionValue, p.product_type AS productType, p.cost_price AS costPrice, p.selling_price AS sellingPrice, p.manufacturer, p.country_of_origin AS countryOfOrigin, p.partner_id AS partnerId, (SELECT partner_name FROM TB_PARTNER WHERE partner_id = p.partner_id) AS partnerName, p.category, p.safe_stock AS safeStock, p.product_image AS productImage, p.created_at AS createdAt, p.updated_at AS updatedAt FROM TB_PRODUCT p WHERE p.product_id = #{productId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_PRODUCT ( product_id, product_name, option_value, product_type, cost_price, selling_price, manufacturer, country_of_origin, partner_id, category, safe_stock, product_image, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{productId}, #{productName}, #{optionValue}, #{productType}, #{costPrice}, #{sellingPrice}, #{manufacturer}, #{countryOfOrigin}, #{partnerId}, #{category}, #{safeStock}, #{productImage}, SYSDATE, NULL )

SELECT p.product_id AS productId, p.product_name AS productName, p.option_value AS optionValue, p.product_type AS productType, p.cost_price AS costPrice, p.selling_price AS sellingPrice, p.manufacturer, p.country_of_origin AS countryOfOrigin, p.partner_id AS partnerId, (SELECT partner_name FROM TB_PARTNER WHERE partner_id = p.partner_id) AS partnerName, p.category, p.safe_stock AS safeStock, p.product_image AS productImage, p.created_at AS createdAt, p.updated_at AS updatedAt FROM TB_PRODUCT p
AND p.product_id LIKE '%' || #{productId} || '%'
AND p.product_name LIKE '%' || #{productName} || '%'
AND p.product_type = #{productType}
AND p.partner_id = #{partnerId}
AND p.category LIKE '%' || #{category} || '%'
AND p.country_of_origin LIKE '%' || #{countryOfOrigin} || '%'
ORDER BY p.product_id
